item.title: Event Mobile App
item.description:
polyconf.com
Android Play
Evapp application for events and conferences. You can build and customize the application to an event. Attendees can check the schedule, the speakers’ bio, partners and sponsors in a simple way. The application can work in two modes with and without registration. You can send push notifications and use QR scanner for tickets.
You can promote your conference and cut the cost of mobile applications which are available on then main mobile platforms such as Android, iOS and WP8. Tell us your requirements and we will develop awesome apps for your business.

item.title: Hybrid Apps
item.description:
centrum24.pl
m.bzwbk24.pl
For 11 years we were (and whole team of course) responsible for development of electronic banking apps. A lot of Java and C/C++ code, we changed app from EJB/JSP to Apache Wicket Framework and later to AngularJS. We were in mobile banking apps projects, tring to reuse our code base with other software house. We were pionieers of hybrid apps (Ionic framework) for better CX and faster/better software delivery.
We created REST API for electronic banking apps and backends services
In corporate enviroment it was always challenging
one small step for [a] bank, one giant leap for developers.

item.title: Ionic Framework
item.description:
http://ionicpoland.github.io

Ionicpoland - the place where technology meets with business. We build a community for people who are enthusiastic about mobile hybrid applications and new modern backend based on cloud computing. We strongly believe in the potential of html5/js in the mobile world and we rethink mobile applications. We want to connect specialists with business and promote innovative apps and projects in Poland. That’s way we decided to promote ionic framework which is built with passion by dryfico. Say yes for mobile applications in the smart way and join http://ionicpoland.github.io.

item.title: Citi Mobile Challenge
item.description:
http://www.citimobilechallenge.com/

We like hackathons and challenges, on citi mobile challenge we did mobile and wearable app with voice interface for banking, travel.

Our product key features:

  • Enable Corporate Social Responsibility
  • Creating Shared Value
  • Security
  • Easy in use
  • Seamless integration with existing solution

    • More info on Citi Mobile Challenge http://www.citimobilechallenge.com/blog/post/id/warsaw-connectivity
